page.title: 20SURVEY IN EARDISLEY/CREDITS
page.content: In the{survey}done by the children of Eardisley School they enquired into the{shopping habits}of the people in the area.It was discovered that most people shopped mainly in Eardisley and Hereford with very few people going to Kington or Leominster.{Hobbies}covered a wide variety of activities but {gardening,sport and reading}were the most popular.When asked for the things that were{needed}in the area better public transport,more sports and play facilities were the overwhelming replies. {Credits}:-Information concerning clubs and societies collected by Eardisley W.I. All other information and research done by the junior children of Eardisley C.of E.School.
